page.title: 20Salmon fishing at TURF
page.content: There are a number of species of fish caught in the Estuary,in their season:flukes(dabs),grey mullet and shellfish.Salmon are THE catch.The South West Water Auth licenses 18 crews to net salmon below Retreat. Between Feb and Aug,two hours before low water crews from Topsham and Lympstone will row to narrow parts of the river(0296500854 'Wrange', 0296700862 'The Cupboard').The shoreman will take one end of the 400 yd net and the boatmen will take the other round in a circle, enclosing up to three-quarters of the channel. The net is then hauled ashore and the 'bunt'is watched closely for signs of a fish. Catches are much rarer these days(pollution,disease),an average of perhaps 80,6 to 10lb fish each @ #2.50/lb Written by Bill Bailey.
